Installation
============

Without Git
~~~~~~~~~~~
#. Download the repository as a zip file from Github
#. Extract the zip file
#. Open a command prompt inside the folder
#. Descend down the directory tree until you see a folder labelled "easydrive". Do not go into that folder.
#. Execute one of these commands:

Windows
-------
.. code-block:: shell

    py -m pip install .

Mac/Linux
---------
.. code-block:: shell

    python3 -m pip install .

With Git
~~~~~~~~

Windows
-------
.. code-block:: shell

    git clone https://github.com/PascalRombach/py-easydrive
    cd py-easydrive
    py -m pip install .

Mac/Linux
---------
.. code-block:: shell

    git clone https://github.com/PascalRombach/py-easydrive
    cd py-easydrive
    python3 -m pip install .
